Package de.piratenpartei.id.vote

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Every user has an account.
    Config
    Config stores all those configuration parameters that are somehow chosen arbitrarily.
    Helper
    This class is the main work horse.
    Message
    A signed message that is used to communicate with any kind of service.
    Messenger  
    PrivateAccount  
    PublishedAccounts
    This class manages the list of published accounts.
    VerifiedAccounts
    This class manages the verified accounts.
    VoteManager
    This class manages the voting part of this application: Key and Account Management, sending signed Messages, controlling Signatures of other Messages.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalFormatException
    This Exception is thrown if something failed while reading some message/file.
    KeyException
    This Exception is thrown if a Key is not of the correct type, or if the key doesn't match to its associated hash value.
    VerificationException
    This exception is thrown, if a message failed to verify.
